Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Organizing armed workers and peasants to carry out agrarian revolution" (组织工农武装进行土地革命), this second part (of two) covers the "Second Civil Revolutionary War Period 1927-1937" (第二次国内革命战争时期 1927-1937).It shows the Long March (1934-1935); the Zunyi Conference (1935); Mao Zedong; various military commanders, including Deng Xiaoping and Ye Jianying; Song Qingling; and Yan'an, where the Long March ended.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)The Long March (1934-1935)ZunyiYe JianyingDeng XiaopingSong QinglingYan'an
